|brand = Geniatech |model = XPI-S905 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = X3 |revision = (2GB) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = RMZ20121203_V1.1 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S905X3; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A55 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1WEPD-B031; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Leahkinn;LTHS0066GS4-ZPK2; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |lan2_ports = <!-- 4, --> |lan2_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |totlan = <!-- total lan ports --> |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = AC:DB:DA |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Type-C
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE), HDMI 2.1, UART, I2C, SPI, GPIO |addchip = 8K Two-Wire Serial EEPROM;Fremont Micro Devices;FT24C08;;1;,,, 4-port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2021 |estprice = 42 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA9DCJ487344 |asin = B09TNK7V59 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = USB (non-standard connector) |rad1chip1 = Marvell (NXP);88W8897M; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RMZ20121203_V1.1" and "2021/12/07" are silkscreened on the board bottom.
{{See also|Geniatech XPI-3128|Amlogic}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S905X3 :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: Mali-G31 @650MHz *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 8GB eMMC 5.1 Flash, TF card (max.64GB)/MMC card *WiFi: [[Marvell (NXP)]] 2T2R 802.11abgn+ac, BT 4.2 BLE *USB: 3x USB 2.0 ports, 1x USB 3.0 port *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin port *Power Source: 5V via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/09/xpi-s905x2-s905x3-4k-sbc-with-2gb-ram/ ''XPI-S905X3/S905X2 4K SBC with 2GB RAM'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/amlogic-s905x-based-pi-lookalike-starts-at-35/ ''Amlogic S905X based Pi lookalike'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] "RMZ20121203_V1.1" and "2021/12/07" are silkscreened on the board bottom.
